sources.title: It 1927 Colorized
sources.description: Fun lively romantic comedy about a cute salesgirl with plenty of 'It' (charisma) who pursues a love relationship with her boss. Starring Clara Bow, Antonio Moreno as the boss, and William Austin as their wonderfully kooky pal Monty. Gary Cooper appears in a small uncredited role as news reporter.Â  IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0018033 Colorized using DeOldify technology. No soundtrack. Public Domain movie. (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
